availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lafayette F. Weldon (Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Weldon. Father of Charles S. Weldon. Farm hand in Mercer County in 1860. Private in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) from November 1, 1862, to February 28, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population/Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 53.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0038.
